name: resource_identifier
displayName: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

name: resource_classification
dataverseAlias: Classification of the resource within the predefined categories
displayName: Group of items providing Information about classification of the resource within the predefined categories.

name: resource_type
displayName: A term describing the resource. You can register a study, a study protocol, a questionnaire, etc.

name: resource_classification_resource_type_general
dataverseAlias: In what form is the resource available?
displayName: Specific information about the form in which the resource is available. You can select "Text" for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.

name: resource_titles
displayName: Group of items providing Information about title(s)/name(s) of the resource.

name: resource_titles_text
displayName: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the resource. Please provide at least one title/name of the resource. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

name: resource_acronyms
displayName: Group of items providing Information about acronym(s) of the resource.

name: resource_acronyms_text
displayName: If existing, acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE]. Apply placeholder everywhere The property refers primarily to studies which often have an acronym. For other types of resources, a short title (preferably up to 5 words) can be provided, e.g. "NAKO-COVID Questionnaire".

name: resource_description_english
displayName: Group of items with an English description of the resource.

name: resource_description_english_text
displayName: A short plain text summary describing the resource in English.

name: resource_descriptions_non_english
displayName: Group of items with description(s) of the resource written not in English.

name: resource_descriptions_non_english_text
displayName: Short plain text summary of the resource other than in English.

name: resource_keywords
displayName: Group of items providing Information about keywords describing the resource.

name: resource_keywords_label
displayName: Keyword(s) describing the resource. Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT.

name: resource_keywords_label_code
displayName: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary. If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

name: resource_languages
displayName: Language(s) in which the [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided. Select all that apply.

name: resource_web_page
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the [RESOURCE].

name: resource_non_study_details
displayName: Group of items applicable only to the resources which are not a study/substudy.

name: resource_version
displayName: If applicable, the version number of the [RESOURCE].

name: resource_format
displayName: The file format of the [RESOURCE] (E.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).

name: resource_use_rights
dataverseAlias: Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing Information about the rights to (re-)use the resource.

name: resource_use_rights_label
displayName: License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list. If “Other” is selected, an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions has to be provided in the field “Additional information about use rights”.

name: resource_use_rights_confirmations
dataverseAlias: Important information about licensing, if a Creative Commons license is selected.
displayName: Group of items applicable if a Creative Commons license is selected.

name: resource_use_rights_confirmation_authority
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have authority to license the [RESOURCE]?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have authority to license the resource.

name: resource_use_rights_confirmation_terms
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors have read and understand the terms of the chosen license.

name: resource_use_rights_confirmation_irrevocability
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is irrevocable?
displayName: Confirmation that the authors understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.

name: resource_use_rights_support_by_licensing
dataverseAlias: Do you confirm that the authors allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
displayName: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to mark the resource with the license information.

name: resource_use_rights_description
displayName: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the resource.

name: roles
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the resource.

name: role_name_type
displayName: Personal or organisational/group type of the name. Personal or organisational/group name?

name: role_name_organisational_group
displayName: Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the resource. Organisational name can be used to denote a research group or an institution.

name: role_name_organisational_group_type
displayName: Type of the role an organisation, institution or group fulllfils. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document. Which role does the organisation/institution/group/etc. fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: role_name_organisational_group_type_funding_id
displayName: Identifier assigned by a funder to the resource. If available, you can enter a funding identifier

name: role_name_organisational_group_name
displayName: Name of the organisation, institution or group.

name: role_name_personal
displayName: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the resource.

name: role_name_personal_type
displayName: Type of the role a person fulllfils. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document. Which role does the person fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name: role_name_identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.

name: role_name_identifiers_identifier
displayName: Digital identifier of the person according to a definite scheme. Preferably, provide an ORCID (https://orcid.org/).

name: role_name_identifiers_scheme
dataverseAlias: Which type of identifer is reported?

name: role_email
displayName: Email address of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation.

name: role_phone
displayName: Phone number of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation. Please, use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas, e.g. +49 (0)153 1112233.

name: role_affiliations
dataverseAlias: Further information about organisation(s) associated with the role
displayName: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_name
displayName: Name of the organisation associated with the role. If you are have already entered the name of the organistion in the property "Name of the organisation/institution/group", please repeat it here.

name: role_affiliation_address
displayName: Address of the organisation associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_web_page
displayName: Web page of the organisation associated with the role.

name: role_affiliation_identifiers
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.

name: role_affiliation_identifiers_identifier
displayName: Digital identifier of the organisation according to a definite scheme. Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search).

name: role_affiliation_identifiers_scheme
displayName: Type of the identifier scheme. Which type of identifer is reported?

name: ids_alternative
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given resource by another registering systems, e.g. a register of clinical trials or a data repository. If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a register of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide corresponding identifier(s) here.

name: ids_alternative_type
displayName: Type/name of the system where the given resource is already registered.

name: ids_alternative_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by another registering system, e.g. by a register of clinical trials or a data repository. E. g., DRKS00021273, NCT04327505, etc.

name: ids
dataverseAlias: Related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
displayName: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given resource, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages. If existing, you can specify identifier(s) of any related resources, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc.

name: ids_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the resource being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc. a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861. b) A link (URL) starting with "http(s)://" to a web page with any additional information can also be provided here.

name: ids_type
displayName: Type of the identifier of the related resource. Select one value from the list.

name: date
displayName: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.

name: ids_relation_type
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B). Select one value from the list.

name: ids_resource_type_general
displayName: Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc. Select one value from the list. For example,. a journal article, dataset, text, etc.

name: ids_nfdi4health
dataverseAlias: Related (sub-)studies, study documents, etc. registered on this portal
displayName: Group of items providing information about related resources registered on this portal. Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal?

name: ids_nfdi4health_identifier
displayName: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
displayName: Relationship between the resource being registered (A) and the related resource (B).

name: nutritional_data
displayName: Indication whether nutritional data was collected by the resource.

name: chronic_diseases
displayName: Indication whether chronic diseases were addressed by the resource.

name: record_linkage_possible
dataverseAlias: Is record linkage with other data sources possible?
displayName: Indication if record linkage is possible.

name: study_design
displayName: Group of items providing information about the characteristics of a study or a substudy.

name: study_primary_design
dataverseAlias: Is it an interventional or non-interventional study?
displayName: Non-interventional study design refers to a study that does not aim to alter study outcomes of interest. Interventional study design refers to a study that aims to alter study outcomes of interest. Select between non-interventional and interventional study design.

name: study_type
displayName: Group of items providing information about the study type.

name: study_type_interventional
displayName: The strategy for assigning interventions to participants. Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, you can specify the study type in the field "Additional information about the study".

name: study_type_non_interventional
displayName: The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up. Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, you can specify the study type in the field "Additional information about the study".

name: study_conditions
dataverseAlias: Primary health condition(s), disease(s) or focus of the study
displayName: Group of items providing information about primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the study, or the focus of the study (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

name: study_conditions_label
dataverseAlias: Name of the primary health condition, disease or focus of the study
displayName: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the study, or the focus of the study (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.). Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

name: study_conditions_classification
displayName: Terminology/classification used for the health condition, diesease or focus. If used, name of the terminology/classification.

name: study_conditions_classification_code
dataverseAlias: Code ---- If known, code of the health condition, disease or focus in the terminology/classification used
displayName: Code of the health condition, disease, focus in the terminology/classification used. If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

name: study_groups_of_diseases
dataverseAlias: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
displayName: Group of items providing information about groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the study.

name: study_groups_of_diseases_generally
dataverseAlias: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
displayName: 'Groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the study. Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'

name: study_diseases_conditions
dataverseAlias: On which other diseases or conditions were the data collected?
displayName: 'Other diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the study. Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO''s ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.'
blockURI: Values are based on lower level ICD-10

name: study_ethics_committee_approval
dataverseAlias: Status of the ethics committee approval
displayName: Status of the study approval from the (leading) ethics committee.

name: study_status
displayName: Overall status of the study. Select one value from the list.

name: study_status_when_intervention
displayName: Specification whether study participants receive intervention or have completed it but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study. Select one value from the list.

name: study_status_halted_stage
dataverseAlias: At what stage was the study stopped?
displayName: If the study was stopped prematurely, specification of the stage at what it was halted. Select one value from the list.

name: study_status_halted_reason
dataverseAlias: Reason why the study was stopped
displayName: If the study was stopped prematurely, specification of the reason(s) why it was halted. E.g., accrual goal met / closed due to toxicity / closed due to lack of study progress / temporarily-closed per study design /etc.

name: study_status_enrolling_by_invitation
displayName: Specification whether study participants have been selected from a predetermined population or enrolled by invitation.

name: study_recruitment_status_register
dataverseAlias: Overall recruitment status of the study from the register of clinical trials
displayName: Overall recruitment status of the study as indicated in the corresponding register of clinical trials.

name: study_start_date
dataverseAlias: Start date of data collection for the study
displayName: Start date of data collection for the study. In case of a planned study, it is the intended start date; in case of an ongoing study — the actual start date.

name: study_end_date
dataverseAlias: End date of data collection for the study
displayName: In case of studies with patients or other participants, it is the date when the last participant is examined or receives an intervention, or the date of the last participant’s last visit. In case of a planned or ongoing study, it is the intended end date; in case of a completed study — the actual end date.

name: study_countries
dataverseAlias: Country(ies) where the study takes place
displayName: Country or countries where the study takes place. Select all that apply.

name: study_region
dataverseAlias: Regions and/or cities within a country where the study takes place
displayName: If applicable, region(s) and/or city(ies) within a country where the study takes place.

name: study_centers
dataverseAlias: Is it a mono- or multicentric study?
displayName: Specification whether a study is conducted at one study center or at more than one study center.

name: study_centers_number
displayName: Number of centers involved in the study.

name: study_subject
displayName: Primary study subject, i.e. a person, an animal or some other type of the subject. Select one value from the list.

name: study_sampling
displayName: Group of items providing information about the applied sampling method. Select one value from the list.

name: study_sampling_method
displayName: Type of the sampling method applied for the selection of study participants. Select one value from the list.

name: study_sampling_method_probability
displayName: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of study participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: study_sampling_method_non_probability
displayName: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of study participants. If known, select one value from the list.

name: study_data_source
dataverseAlias: Data sources from which study data are generated or extracted.
displayName: Group of items providing information about data sources from which study data are generated or extracted.

name: study_data_sources_general
dataverseAlias: Data sources for the study (e.g. biosamples, registries, questionnaires, etc.)
displayName: Different types of data sources from which study data are generated or extracted. Select all that apply.

name: study_data_sources_biosamples
displayName: Specification of biosamples collected in the study.

name: study_data_sources_imaging
dataverseAlias: Imaging data collected in the study
displayName: Specification of imaging data collected in the study.

name: study_data_sources_omics
dataverseAlias: Omics technology used in the study
displayName: Specification of omics technology applied in the study.

name: study_data_source_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about study data sources, e.g. indication of the data source(s) not listed in the property „Data sources for the study” or more detailed description of the selected data sources. E.g., indication of the data source(s) not listed in the field „Data sources for the study” or more detailed description of the selected data sources.

name: study_primary_purpose
displayName: Specification of the main purpose of the study. Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the study was conducted. For non-interventional studies, this field may be "Not appplicable" as multiple purposes may be defined as primary ones.

name: study_eligibility_criteria
displayName: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for study participants.

name: study_eligibility_age_min
displayName: Group of items providing information about the minimum eligible age of study participants.

name: study_eligibility_age_min_number
displayName: Numerical value of the minimum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the study.

name: study_eligibility_age_max
displayName: Group of items providing information about the maximum eligible age of study participants.

name: study_eligibility_age_max_number
displayName: Numerical value of the maximum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the study.

name: study_eligibility_genders
displayName: Gender of potential participants eligible to participate in the study. Select all that apply.

name: study_eligibility_inclusion_criteria
displayName: Inclusion criteria for participation in the study. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

name: study_eligibility_exclusion_criteria
displayName: Exclusion criteria for participation in the study. If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

name: study_population
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about study population. Any information important for the given study population can be specified here.

name: study_target_sample_size
displayName: Intended number of observational units for the whole study (e.g. intended number of study participants at all study sites). Enter “-1” if target sample size was not set or is unknown.

name: study_obtained_sample_size
displayName: Obtained number of observational units for the whole study (e.g. obtained number of study participants at all study sites). The value is only available after the end of recruitment. Enter “-1” if obtained sample size is unknown.

name: study_age_min_examined
displayName: Group of items providing information about the actual minimum age of study participants at the time of examination.

name: study_age_min_examined_number
displayName: Numerical value of the minimum age of study participants at the time of examination.

name: study_age_max_examined
displayName: Group of items providing information about the actual maximum age of study participants at the time of examination.

name: study_age_max_examined_number
displayName: Numerical value of the maximum age of study participants at the time of examination.

name: study_hypothesis
dataverseAlias: Research questions and/or hypothesis underlying the study
displayName: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the study.

name: study_arms_groups
dataverseAlias: Arms or groups/cohorts of the study
displayName: Group of items providing information about arms or groups/cohorts of the study.

name: study_arm_group_label
displayName: Short name used to identify the arm/group.

name: study_arm_group_type
displayName: Role of the given arm in the study. Select one value from the list.

name: study_arm_group_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given arm/group.

name: study_interventions
displayName: Group of items providing information about study interventions or exposures.

name: study_intervention_name
displayName: A short descriptive name of the intervention/exposure. If the same intervention/exposure is associated with more than one arm or group, provide the information once and use the field "Name of the associated study arm/group" to associate it with more than one arm/group.

name: study_intervention_type
displayName: General type of the given intervention/exposure.

name: study_intervention_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given intervention/exposure.

name: study_intervention_arms_groups_label
dataverseAlias: Name of the arm/group associated with the given intervention
displayName: Name of the study arm associated with the given intervention.

name: study_outcomes
displayName: Group of items providing information about outcome measure(s).

name: study_outcome_title
displayName: Name of the outcome measure. For non-interventional studies, this can be the name of specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment. For non-interventional studies, this can be specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.

name: study_outcome_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information about the given outcome

name: study_outcome_type
displayName: Type of the outcome measure. Primary or secondary outcome measure?

name: study_outcome_time_frame
displayName: Description of the time point(s) at which the measurement for the outcome is assessed, e.g. the specific duration of time over which each participant is assessed.

name: study_design_comment
dataverseAlias: Any additional information about the study
displayName: Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties. Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties.

name: study_assessments
dataverseAlias: Further assessments/measurements included in the study

name: study_data_sharing_plan
displayName: Group of items providing information about the data sharing strategy of the study.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_generally
dataverseAlias: Is it planned to share the data?
displayName: Indication whether there is a plan to make data collected in the study available. In case of studies with patients or other individuals, this refers to individual participant data (IPD). Select one value from the list.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_supporting_information
dataverseAlias: Supporting documents available in addition to the data
displayName: Supporting information/documents which will be made available in addition to the study data. Select all that apply.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_time_frame
dataverseAlias: When and for how long will the data be available?
displayName: Indication when the data and, if applicable, supporting documents will become available and for how long.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_access_criteria
displayName: Indication by what access criteria data will be shared, including: a) with whom, b) for what types of analyses, and c) by what mechanism. E.g., with whom, for what types of analyses and by what mechanism the data will be shared.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_description
displayName: Additional descriptive information providing more details about the data sharing, e.g. indication what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided. E.g., indication what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided

name: study_data_sharing_plan_datashield
displayName: Indication, whether the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure is available.

name: study_data_sharing_plan_url
dataverseAlias: Web page with additional information about data sharing
displayName: If existing, a link to the web page where additional information about data sharing can be found.

name: study_design_non_interventional
dataverseAlias: Information about specific aspects of non-interventional studies/substudies
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of interventional studies or substudies.

name: study_time_perspectives
displayName: Temporal design of the study, i.e. the relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment. Is it a retrospective, prospective or cross-sectional study?

name: study_target_followup_duration
displayName: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant is to be followed, provided in years. The value must be provided in years.

name: study_biospecimen_retention
dataverseAlias: Which biosamples are retained in a biorepository?
displayName: Indication whether samples of biomaterial from study participants are retained in a biorepository. Select all that apply.

name: study_biospecimen_description
displayName: Additional information about biosamples to be retained, i.e. which specific types of biospecimens will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.). Which specific types of biosamples will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.)?

name: study_design_interventional
dataverseAlias: Information about specific aspects of interventional studies/substudies
displayName: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of interventional studies or substudies.

name: study_phase
displayName: If applicable, numerical phase of the study. Select one value from the list.

name: study_masking
dataverseAlias: Information about masking of intervention(s) assignment
displayName: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

name: study_masking_general
dataverseAlias: Is masking of intervention(s) assignment implemented?
displayName: Indication, whether a masking (or blinding) of intervention(s) assignment is implemented (i.e., whether someone is prevented from having knowledge of the interventions assigned to individual participants).

name: study_masking_roles
displayName: If masking is implemented, the party(ies) who are masked. Select all that apply.

name: study_masking_description
displayName: If needed, additional descriptive information about masking (e.g. information about other parties who may be masked). If needed, additional information about masking, e.g. other parties who may be masked.

name: study_allocation
dataverseAlias: Type of allocation of participants to an arm
displayName: Type of allocation/assignment of individual study participants to an arm. Select one value from the list.

name: study_off_label_use
dataverseAlias: Off-label use of a drug product
displayName: Unapproved (off-label) use of a drug product. Select "Yes" or "No" only for drug studies and "Not applicable” for all other studies.

name: provenance
dataverseAlias: Information about provenance aspects of the data entry
displayName: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on the portal.

name: data_source
displayName: Source of information about the resource and the way it was uploaded/collected.

name: verification_date
displayName: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the resource, even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.

name: verification_date_user
displayName: User who last verified the information about the resource.

name: resource_first_submitted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the resource was first submitted for publication.

name: resource_first_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication
displayName: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.

name: resource_first_posted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published
displayName: Date when the resource was first posted/published.

name: resource_first_posted_user
displayName: User who first posted/published the resource.

name: last_update_submitted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication
displayName: Date when the last update of the resource was submitted for publication.

name: last_update_submitted_user
dataverseAlias: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE]
displayName: User who submitted the last update of the resource.

name: last_update_posted_date
dataverseAlias: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published
displayName: Date when the last update of the resource was posted/published.

name: last_update_posted_user
dataverseAlias: User who posted/published the last update
displayName: User who posted/published the last update.

name: provenance_resource_version
dataverseAlias: Version number of the resource within the portal/system
displayName: Version number of the resource within the portal/system.

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial 4.0 International)

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: resource_use_rights_label
dataverseAlias: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International)

name: ids_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: ids_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: ids_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: ids_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is new version of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is previous version of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is variant form of B

name: ids_nfdi4health_relation_type
dataverseAlias: A is original form of B

name: study_groups_of_diseases_generally
dataverseAlias: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (19)

name: study_groups_of_diseases_generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the blood or blood-forming organs (03)

name: study_groups_of_diseases_generally
dataverseAlias: Diseases of the ear or mastoid process (10)
